twoSetSkill.name: Senior 2 pieces
twoSetSkill.description: On hit, Charged ATK boosts Move Speed by 40.0% and Fire DMG by 30.0% for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Rita equip bonus: 20.0% bonus Total DMG.

threeSetSkill.name: Legacy 3 pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Charged ATK deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG. Rita equip bonus: Charged ATK deals 50.0% bonus Fire DMG.
